results.name: Number of forests of rooted trees with 2n colored nodes using exactly n colors.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..187
maple: b:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n<2, n, (add(add(d*b(d, k),
a:= n-> add(b(2*n+1, n-i)*(-1)^i*binomial(n, i), i=0..n):
